subject: Horse Racing
Haskell Invitational
lead_paragraph: Paynter won by three and three-quarters lengths in the $1 million race, but neither his trainer Ahmed Zayat nor his owner Bob Baffert was in attendance.
snippet: Paynter won by three and three-quarters lengths in the $1 million race, but neither his trainer Ahmed Zayat nor his owner Bob Baffert was in attendance.
